department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Purchase two drones and sensor equipment for plant phenotyping research purposes
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Tuesday, 25th, July 2024, 2:00 PM Eastern Daylight Time
full_summary: ### Solicitation Title: Drones and Sensor Equipment **Reference Number:** WS4556676205- Doc4666385409 **Solicitation Number:** WS4556676205 **Publication Date:** 2024-07-02 **Closing Date and Time:** 2024-07-25, 2:00 PM (Eastern Time) **Amendment Date:** 2024-07-18 **Tender Description** The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) on behalf of the Department of Agriculture and Agri-Food (AAFC) is soliciting offers to provide two drones and sensor equipment for plant phenotyping research purposes. The proposed contract will be a sole-source award based on the lowest price offer received. The selection criteria are clearly outlined in the solicitation. **Period of Performance** The expected contract start date is 2024-09-06, with no expected end date. The delivery location will be at Saskatoon. **Contact Information** For all inquiries, please contact: Lyland Wiebe Department of Public Works and Government Services Email: [lyland.wiebe@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:lyland.wiebe@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca) **Notice and Attachment** The solicitation notice can be found at: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/20195593?extsite=MjAxOTU1OTNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg== ## Contracting Entity ### Information * Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) * 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada --- ## Clause List - [Solicitation Title](#solicitation-title) - [reference number](#reference-number) - [Solicitation Number](#solicitation number) - [Publication Date](#publication-date) - [Closing Date and Time](#closing-date-and-time) - [Amendment Date](#amendment-date) - [Tender Description](#tender-description) - [Period of Performance](#period-of-performance) - [Contact Information](#contact-information) - [Notice and Attachment](#notice-and-attachment) - [Contracting Entity](#contracting-entity) ### Solicitation Title *
